class.name: Joint2D
class.brief_description: Base node for all joint constraints in 2D physics.
class.description: Base node for all joint constraints in 2D physics. Joints take 2 bodies and apply a custom constraint.

method.name: get_node_a
method.description: Return the path to the A node for the joint.

method.name: get_node_b
method.description: Return the path to the B node for the joint.

method.name: set_node_a
method.description: Set the path to the A node for the joint. Must be of type [PhysicsBody2D].

method.name: set_node_b
method.description: Set the path to the B node for the joint. Must be of type [PhysicsBody2D].
